articles.author: Chris Giles, George Steer, Martin Arnold, Colby Smith
articles.title: Eurozone inflation hits 2-year low as US price pressures ease - Financial Times
articles.description: Data helps steady bond markets and signals prospect of end to interest rate rises on both sides of Atlantic
articles.content: Eurozone inflation has fallen to its lowest level for almost two years and US price rises last month were less than expected, raising the prospect that interest rate rises on both sides of the Atlant… [+4617 chars]

articles.author: Camilla Hodgson
articles.title: What Lina Khan's antitrust case could mean for Amazon - Financial Times
articles.description: The FTC chair alleges the ecommerce giant illegally uses its monopoly power to overcharge consumers and hobble competitors. But will she prevail?
articles.content:
On an internet forum in August, merchants who sell products on Amazons marketplace began speculating about the prospect of a lawsuit being brought against the ecommerce giant.
